main event: A civilian airliner aircraft almost collided with a round, white object the size of a basketball at an altitude of 70,000 feet.
interesting points: The object appeared to alter its course, causing turbulence in the air around the aircraft.
The object was heading in a westerly direction, and disappeared from sight.
The weather conditions at the time of the sighting included clear skies and high-altitude winds.
The aircraft was a Beechcraft Bonanza flying at 7,000 feet MSL.
sighted object: a round, white object the size of a basketball
